title: Watch Face: Silver Metal
summary: The silver experience right on your android wear watch face.
description: A touch of excellence.  This watch face will enrich any smartwatch with clean cut silver.  All the hands move by the millisecond to get the most accurate and smooth experience.  This includes the hour, minute and second hands on the watch.  Smooth hands allows the watch face to display the time in a classic style as you would see on a real watch.  This silver metal watch face displays multiple elements of information on the two information panels on either side of the watch face.  The panels can be modified in the settings menu to suit personal needs.  Try Executive Silver Watch Face today!- The silver experience- Detailed weather- Sync with Google Calendar- Missed calls with details- Day of the Week- Date- Month- Watch battery level- Phone battery level- Step counter- Battery efficient ambient mode- Customize panels to suit personal needs- Experience silver steel on your watch face like never before!This Silver metal watch face for android wear works well on both round and square devices.Available on the following android wear devices:Moto 360 ( moto360 )Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )Huawei WatchLG G Watch R ( lgwr )LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )Samsung Gear LiveAsus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )Fossil QTAG Heuer ConnectedMichael Kors AccessWhen downloading this app, be sure to have Android Wear installed.  Android Wear is needed in order to install Executive Silver Watch Face to your smartwatch.When downloading this app, be aware that it takes some time for the watch face to appear in your android wear application.  You can also use Settings > Resync apps found in your wear application.  The process usually takes up to 2 minutes.  Bluetooth is relatively slow so if the watch seems slow and the watch face will not load then give it more time.Visit http://www.osthoro.com for all available watchfaces or search osthoro on the play store.
descriptionHTML:
A touch of excellence. This watch face will enrich any smartwatch with clean cut silver. All the hands move by the millisecond to get the most accurate and smooth experience. This includes the hour, minute and second hands on the watch. Smooth hands allows the watch face to display the time in a classic style as you would see on a real watch. This silver metal watch face displays multiple elements of information on the two information panels on either side of the watch face. The panels can be modified in the settings menu to suit personal needs. Try Executive Silver Watch Face today!

- The silver experience
- Detailed weather
- Sync with Google Calendar
- Missed calls with details
- Day of the Week
- Date
- Month
- Watch battery level
- Phone battery level
- Step counter
- Battery efficient ambient mode
- Customize panels to suit personal needs
- Experience silver steel on your watch face like never before!

This Silver metal watch face for android wear works well on both round and square devices.

Available on the following android wear devices:

Moto 360 ( moto360 )
Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )
Fossil Q
TAG Heuer Connected
Michael Kors Access

When downloading this app, be sure to have Android Wear installed. Android Wear is needed in order to install Executive Silver Watch Face to your smartwatch.

When downloading this app, be aware that it takes some time for the watch face to appear in your android wear application. You can also use Settings > Resync apps found in your wear application. The process usually takes up to 2 minutes. Bluetooth is relatively slow so if the watch seems slow and the watch face will not load then give it more time.

Visit http://www.osthoro.com for all available watchfaces or search osthoro on the play store.
recentChanges: - Added a rate button. Rate this app!
- Fixed a bug that was causing text to overlap the watch hands
- improved the landing page on your smartphone
